title: Couple Posing in Blue Suits with Floral Curtains
description: A couple dressed in blue suits is seated indoors. The man, wearing a blue suit with a bow tie, has his hands clasped with the woman sitting on him. The woman wears a matching blue suit and a white hat with a bow. Behind them is a curtain with a colorful floral pattern. The setting suggests a cozy indoor environment with a light-colored wall and a visible light switch.
